name: Envirosavers
description:
This a game where you play as a tree fighting against cigarette enemies that are attempting to destroy the environment. The enemies shoot fireballs at the player while the player attempts to save the environment by killing the cigarette monsters. and progressing from environment to environment destroying as many enemies as possible. There are also various items in each environment that the player can collect such as leaves and pine cones; the player can regenerate their health by collecting two items.

Controls:

Pause: Escape

Quit: Backspace

Movement: WASD

Shoot: Mouse1

Change Attack: 1 or 2 Alternates Fire type

Dash: Left Shift
